name: 2D Shooter - Orion Hunter
description:
This is my 2D Shooter Project, enjoy!

Modifications:

1. Added 2 unique levels with different objectives.

2. Added instructions to the instructions tab, also added a little bit of background (story) to the game.

3.  Added the current objetive to every pause screen.

4. Changed the main menu style.
